name: Pier Solar HD an RPG for XBOX360, PC, Mac, Linux & Dreamcast
blurb: Pier Solar is the biggest 16-bit RPG ever and it's coming to you in high definition for Xbox 360, PC, Mac, Linux & Sega Dreamcast!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Pledge your support to become a backer and we will send you a Pier Solar sticker, plus you will have access to donor only updates that offer behind the scenes development of Pier Solar HD!
Pier Solar HD for XBOX 360. A Digital copy.
Pier Solar HD for PC, Mac or Linux. A Digital Downloadable copy of the game - DRM free.
Pier Solar Original Soundtrack. A 4 CD soundtrack that includes a cute little poster. These are the last remaining units that will ever be available!
The Digital Bundle. This bundle includes the XBOX 360 digital version, the PC/MAC/LINUX version and the full 4 CD Pier Solar OST in MP3 form!

Pier Solar Regular Edition for SEGA Dreamcast. You get to choose whichever region/packaging you want: either USA, Europe or Japanese packaging. We will send you a survey to select which region you want later.
Pier Solar Regular Edition for PC, Mac and Linux. The physical regular edition.

The Physical Bundle. This bundle includes EITHER the regular physical edition of Pier Solar for Sega Dreamcast OR the regular physical edition of Pier Solar for PC/MAC/LINUX and the physical 4 CD Pier Solar OST! We will send you a survey to select which Dreamcast region you want later.

Pier Solar HD Collectors Edition for PC, Mac & Linux. A beautiful, limited edition, physical package that includes Pier Solar HD compatible with PC, Mac & Linux, the Pier Solar Guide Book, a signed lithography, and three beautiful figurines. Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 250 produced, ever!

Pier Solar Collectors Edition for SEGA Dreamcast. A beautiful, limited edition, physical package that includes Pier Solar for SEGA Dreamcast (You get to choose whichever version you want: either USA, Europe or Japanese versions), the Pier Solar Guide Book, a signed lithography, and three beautiful figurines.  Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 750 produced, ever! We will send you a survey to select which region you want later.

Limited edition Poster...... Any Collector\u2019s Edition of your choice. +++PLUS+++ An exclusive, kickstarter limited edition poster made in super high quality material. Limited and numbered to 150 total. 30in x 22in (55cm x 76 cm).

I am the boss...... You get a Collector\u2019s Edition of your choice. +++PLUS+++ The limited edition Poster. +++PLUS+++ We will design you as the big boss in Pier Solar based off a picture that you submit! All the games we make (physical and digital) will feature you as an unlockable boss and you will receive an exclusive code that is used in game to activate this feature, so that you can challenge your friends to beat you! Also includes a custom cover with you as the big boss on it as well as the original signed sketch! This feature will be compatible with all versions of the game. A Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 10!

Pier Solar Classic Edition for SEGA Mega Drive and SEGA Genesis...... You get a collectors edition of Pier Solar HD of your choice.  +++PLUS+++ The limited edition Poster.  +++PLUS+++ The choice of whichever Pier Solar Classic version you want: USA, Europe, or Japanese packaging and we will sign it for you! We will send you a survey to select which region(s) you want later.

One of a kind collectors pieces...... You get a Collector's Edition of your choice. +++PLUS+++ The limited edition Poster. +++PLUS+++ A 100x100mm laser-cut of the original printing plates, annotated, numbered and signed. Includes a certificate of Authenticity. Protected in custom artboard casing. A Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 25!
A Pier Solar SEGA Dreamcast System. A SEGA Dreamcast system custom branded with Pier Solar artwork. It will include the custom system, controller and VMU. A Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 5!

A Pier Solar Xbox 360 System...... You get a Digital copy of Pier Solar HD on XBOX 360  (or Collector\u2019s Edition of your choice)! +++PLUS+++  The limited edition Poster. +++PLUS+++ We\u2019ll build you a beautiful, custom Xbox 360 system custom branded with Pier Solar artwork on the system and controller. It will be a brand new Xbox 360 with 250 GB system or Xbox 360 with Kinect. We\u2019ll send a survey for you to choose your version.  A Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 10!

The Pier Solar Prototype Package...... You get the Collector\u2019s Edition box of your choice. +++PLUS+++ The limited edition Poster. +++PLUS+++ The original Pier Solar Prototypes! Includes Prototype cartridge, Prototype mega CD disc, Beta Testing A4 sheet (the sheet beta testers have used) and a Certificate of Authenticity. Protected by custom wood and artboard casing making it a true collector\u2019s treasure. A Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 5!

Bethina's Diary......  You get the Collector\u2019s Edition box of your choice. +++PLUS+++ The edited edition Poster. +++PLUS+++ Something totally special and unique: One of the two independently unique work books, filled with 100% original pieces, no copies. 150+ pages of artwork, drawings, proof printings, script, sketches, technical notes and more. Each book itself is made of original raw material, assembled by hand and stitched as an antique book. The book cover is made of Pier Solar packaging compound. Many pages are annotated by hand. Additionally it contains three 100x100 laser-cuts of original printing plates, annotated, numbered and signed. Includes a Certificate of Authenticity. Protected by custom wood and artboard casing. A Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 2!

The Super Package. The be all, end all collectors package! All three super rare posterity versions of Pier Solar for SEGA Genesis/MegaDrive (USA, EU, JP), all 3 SEGA Dreamcast versions (USA, EU, JP), the Pier Solar OST, the Pier Solar Guide Book, and both Pier Solar Reprint editions. Every item is signed by the developers. A Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 1!

Come Party with us in Paris...... Get the OST. +++PLUS+++ All physical versions of the game (PC and Dreamcast in all 3 regions, plus a PC collector\u2019s box and Dreamcast Collectors box in all 3 regions as well. Total of 8 games) +++PLUS+++ The limited edition Poster. +++PLUS+++ An exclusive invite for you and as many friends as you'd like you to come party with us in Paris! You and your friends will have an exclusive invite to a launch party for Pier Solar HD. Afterward we will have a beautiful dinner in Paris followed by drinks and a real good time! (We will pay the round trip airplane tickets for you and hand you the invitations for all the friends that you invite.)
